name: The 4th Realm - Scenes Experience
description:
Description

This project is a walking simulator in the scenes from The 4th Realm story.

There are 2 scenes to be downloaded to explore. 

1. George bedroom.  dd

2. Soldier Scene. This scene happens after the end of the book.  What's happening in the scene is George encounters a small group of soldiers in an alley when he's trying to escape  from the army camp after he got captured at the boarder. 

Control

WASD - Walking

Mouse - Look around

Esc - Exit the game

Credits
